Product Description

IGAN 6-inch Wire Cutters. One of the Strongest Lightweight Cutters

IGAN-P6

IGAN was originally founded in 2002 with an independent team of laboratory engineers. Specializing in the development and design of accessories for hand tools, automotive supplies, sports facilities, and fishing industries.

Product Features Flush and Clean Cut 13/16” Cutting Edge High Hardness CR-V Steel Labor-saving Handle, Spring-loaded Non-slip Matte Handle

Ultra Sharp, Powerful, Widely Used

13/16” Extra-Long Cutting Edge, will meet most of your cutting needs. Can easily snips soft wire up to 12 AWG.

Professional Flush Cut

Use the IGAN-P6 wire cutter to create precise flush cutting! Improved blades provide a superior shearing action with a smooth, flat and clean cut.

Durable & Reliable Tools

Forged from high-hardness Chrome Vanadium Tool Steel, heat-treated and precision ground angled head. One of the strongest 6-inch wire clippers.

Do The Job Right

Ideal Wire Cutters for Crafts, Floral wire, Electrical wire, Cable Ties, Plastic, Jewelry making, Household, etc.

Labor-saving Tools

Perfect length to provide great leverage with a spring-loaded mechanism to minimize hand fatigue.

Cutting Capacity

Soft wire 12 AWG, Iron wire 12AWG(Φ2.0mm), Plastic Φ3.0mm, not for use on Steel Wire.If any IGAN P6 Flush Cutter ever fails for any reason, simply email or reply to IGAN and IGAN will ship a replacement.

✓

1.Ultra-Sharp Wire Cutters: 13/16” extra-long cutting edge can easily snips electrical wire up to 12 AWG.
2.Specialized Flush Cut: Improved blades design provide a smooth, flat and clean cut. Ideal wire cutters for Crafting, Floral wire, Electrical wire, Artificial flowers, Cable Ties, Plastic, Edge banding, etc.
3.High Hardness CR-V: Forged from chrome vanadium tool steel, heat-treated and precision ground angled head. One of the strongest 6-inch wire clippers.
4.Labor-saving Tools: Perfect length to provide great leverage with a spring-loaded mechanism to minimize hand fatigue.
5.Full lifetime warranty: If any IGAN P6 Flush Cutter ever fails for any reason, simply email or reply to the IGAN customer service and IGAN will ship a replacement.

From the brand

AUTEL, a famous brand in the automotive aftermarket, is synonymous with high quality, experience, and professionalism.

Since 2004, AUTEL has been deeply involved in global automotive diagnostics and inspections. After years of independent research, development, and innovation, we’ve formed our own unique core technology accumulation.

Now, AUTEL products allow us to see how significantly they changed ways of global auto repair and maintenance.

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

More Autel Diagnostics Scanner

【TURN OFF CEL】 This AL319 car diagnostic tool supports Reading DTCs, displaying Live Data, Freeze Frame & I/M Readiness etc to figure out the root cause of the Check Engine Light (CEL) and turning it off, to help you detect any potential problems, and to avoid excessive costs for unnecessary repairs.
【EXTENSIVE APPLICATION】 Autel AL319 Compatible with 7 languages (English, French, Spanish, etc.) and various post-1996 OBD II protocol vehicles (Toyota, Nissan, Honda, Ford, etc.), this OBD II scanner provides accurate and fast diagnosis for worldwide car owners.
【FOR END USER & DIYERS】 This error code reader AL319 is “plug and play” and comes with an easy interface. Even if you’re not familiar with vehicle repair, you can quickly take control of this obd2 scanner, and get the information you want.
【USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN】 This check engine code reader features a patented One-Click I/M Readiness Key, TFT color display, built-in speaker, LED Indicator etc. The cable is long enough without being too long and getting in the way. No batteries are needed.
【HIGH-QUALITY SERVICES】 12 months warranty from the date of purchase and lifetime free update are offered by this Automobile OBDII scan tool. Welcome to contact us via Q&A, email, or hotline, and our after-sale-service team for technical support.


Why We Need an AL319？

item.title: BDJ Dog Nail Grinder with 2 LED Lights Upgraded 3-Speed Electric Recharge Pet Nail Trimmer with Clippers & Files Powerful Painless Paws Grooming & Smoothing for Small Medium Large Dogs & Cats
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Components Pet Nail Grinder * 1 Pet Nail Clippers * 1 Pet Nail File* 1 USB Charging Cable * 1 Cleaning Brush*1 User Manual * 1 Built-in Dual LED Lights & Superior Safety Super-bright 2 LED lights make you look at the nail location easier. Never worry about ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99 - $16.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 06:07:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Components

Pet Nail Grinder * 1 Pet Nail Clippers * 1 Pet Nail File* 1 USB Charging Cable * 1 Cleaning Brush*1 User Manual * 1

Built-in Dual LED Lights & Superior Safety

Super-bright 2 LED lights make you look at the nail location easier. Never worry about over-grinding.The independent LED light switch design allows you to turn on or off it according to different needs.

Upgraded Motor & Diamond Grinding Head

The new version of BDJ dog nail grinders with a powerful motor support heavy grinding. The power boosted by 20% makes fast and effective grinding.Upgraded diamond grinding makes more durable and reusable.

Low Noise Grinder < 50 db,Safer, Faster, Easier.

The upgraded BDJ dog nail grinder uses a superior motor with whisper-quiet technology.The low noise & low vibration makes your pets feel relaxed when grooming. Provide an efficient and comfortable nail grinding experience.

Advanced 3-Speed Switch & Smart LCD

The upgraded LCD design shows the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient to use.Adjustable 3-speed (7000-9000 RPM) & 3 grinding ports nail grinder is widely applied to small, medium, large pets, simply choose the appropriate port and speed depending on your pet’s size and nail hardness.

How to Groom Your Pets Nail Safely?

Step 1: Use the pet nail clippers to cut the sharp and too-long nails first.

Step 2: Turn on the grinder and accustom your pet to the sound and smell to avoid scaring it.

Step 3: Put the electric nail grinder around the 45 oblique angles and trim the nails carefully.

Step 4: It’s necessary to treat your pet after every progress. Reward it with its favorite snacks.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.24 x 3.46 x 2.36 inches; 6.7 Ounces
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Ion batteries required.
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 14, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ BDJ
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09QG4B94W

[ Advanced 3-Speed Switch & 3 Grinding Ports ] Low-high speed design powerful enough support heavy grinding. 3 ports fit all kinds of pets from small, medium and large pets. Choosing the appropriate port and speed according to the size of your pet’s nails. This truly is the perfect dog cat nail grinder.
[ Upgraded Smart LCD and Built in 2 LED Lights Design ] Allow you see the location of dog’s quick more easily and prevent over-grinding or cutting. Reducing the risk of hurting your pet or clipping the claws too short. Upgraded LCD will show you the current mode and battery capacity. It is more convenient for use.
[ Super Low Noise & Vibration ] High-quality motor makes grinder is ultra-quiet in 3 speed modes. The noise is controlled to 50dB while boosting the torque. Pets stays calm while grinding their nails.
[ Smart OS & Rechargeable Easily ] The powerful and intelligent management system greatly increases the service life of the dog nail grinder. And the USB wire can conveniently connect to a laptop, AC adapter or power bank to charge.

Components

  • Pet Nail Grinder * 1
  • Pet Nail Clippers * 1
  • Pet Nail File* 1
  • USB Charging Cable * 1
  • Cleaning Brush*1
  • User Manual * 1

Read more
